text: Skazhi beduinam, ostavshimsya pozadi: «Vas yeshche prizovut voyevat' protiv lyudey, obladayushchikh surovoy moshch'yu. Vy srazites' s nimi, ili zhe oni obratyatsya v islam. Yesli vy podchinites', to Allakh daruyet vam prekrasnuyu nagradu. Yesli zhe vy otvernetes', kak otvernulis' prezhde, to Allakh prichinit vam muchitel'nyye stradaniya»
